mapper.insert: insert into sys_code_mapper (code_type, code_val, ext_sys_flg, ext_code_type, type_name, code_name, ext_code_val, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extSysFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extCodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extCodeVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select code_type, code_val, ext_sys_flg, ext_code_type, type_name, code_name, ext_code_val, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_code_mapper
